title: Why always the afk?? IN RANKED
body:
Okay it happens to me that every 5 matches 4 are lost. But not because of skills or trolls....no...because of AFKs! IN RANKED!
(And the funny thing is that the enemy team never has it)
When you lose a ranked your position lowers...But EVERY 4VS5 is LOST unless you have a master yi and all fed
So my proposal is to not consider won or lost the matches with afks....or at least not taking away points for these matches...it's too easy to win against 4 desperate players
I was in silver IV i've been retroceded because i lost 4 matches with 1 or even 2 afks. i hate this
